References: NSF grant AST-1515927, the Mt. Cuba Astronomical Foundation, the Center for Cosmology and AstroParticle Physics (CCAPP) at OSU, and the Robert Martin Ayers Sciences Fund
Event Type: discovery of a new transient source
Telescope: quadruple 14-cm "Cassius" telescope and LCOGT 1-m robotic telescope
Observatory: Cerro Tololo, Chile and Siding Spring Observatory
